params._anchors: The binary format RR entries for the root DS records.

setAlgorithm(uint8,address).details: Sets the contract address for a signature verification algorithm.      Callable only by the owner.

params.algo: The address of the algorithm contract.

setDigest(uint8,address).details: Sets the contract address for a digest verification algorithm.      Callable only by the owner.

params.digest: The address of the digest contract.

verifyRRSet((bytes,bytes)[]).details: Takes a chain of signed DNS records, verifies them, and returns the data from the last record set in the chain.      Reverts if the records do not form an unbroken chain of trust to the DNSSEC anchor records.

returns.inception: The inception time of the signed record set.
returns.rrs: The RRData from the last RRSet in the chain.

verifyRRSet((bytes,bytes)[],uint256).details: Takes a chain of signed DNS records, verifies them, and returns the data from the last record set in the chain.      Reverts if the records do not form an unbroken chain of trust to the DNSSEC anchor records.

params.now: The Unix timestamp to validate the records at.

returns.inception: The inception time of the signed record set.
returns.rrs: The RRData from the last RRSet in the chain.
